text: Arnar Jónsson (born January 21, 1943) is an Icelandic actor. Jónsson was born in Akureyri. He is married to Þórhildur Þorleifsdóttir. Arnar has played more leading roles in theaters than any other Icelandic actor. He starred in the film Outlaw and also in 17 other leading roles and about 200 other roles in theater. He likes golf (he plays in competition) and also brought up 5 children.actors-union.is His daughter Sólveig Arnarsdóttir is also an actress. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |- !Year !!
